function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of UV light devices for surface disinfection may not reach all surfaces or provide consistent coverage, leading to incomplete disinfection.","Impact":"Increased risk of surface contamination and potential disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Regular manual inspection and cleaning of areas not reached by UV light devices.","Technologies":"Autonomous robots with intelligent navigation and detection capabilities to identify missed areas and provide feedback for manual cleaning.","People":"Cleaning personnel, building occupants, visitors.","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning staff."},{"Description":"Incorporating thermal sensors and vision algorithms onto autonomous or remotely operated robots for temperature screening may lead to inaccurate or misleading results.","Impact":"Failure to detect individuals with elevated temperatures, potentially allowing infected individuals to go undetected.","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and maintenance of thermal sensors, supplemented with manual temperature checks where necessary.","Technologies":"Advanced algorithms for accurate temperature measurement, regular sensor maintenance and calibration protocols.","People":"Individuals being screened, healthcare personnel, general public.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, screening organizations."},{"Description":"Networking security systems with facial recognition software to trace contacts of infected individuals may pose privacy risks and potential misuse of personal data.","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, potential profiling and discrimination based on health status, and misuse of personal data.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict privacy regulations, data protection measures, and informed consent for data use.","Technologies":"Secure encryption, privacy-preserving algorithms, legal frameworks for data protection.","People":"General public, individuals accessing healthcare facilities, individuals with elevated temperature or COVID-19.","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, data protection authorities."}]}
